name: Darn Tough Bear Town Light Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Women's
categories: Bear Town Light Cushion Micro Crew Socks
description: Lightly cushioned socks to take you comfortably through bear country. Made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that stands up to multi-day backpacking trips.Made of merino wool, nylon, and Lycra.Lightly cushioned sole provide great comfort without bulk.Lightweight wool yarn in a ribbed performance knit with seamless construction ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
